price_sentence: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, including, without limitation, the provisions of Section 2(d) below, as total consideration for the Acquired Assets, Buyer shall pay Seller an aggregate of Twenty-One Million Dollars ($21,000,000) (the “Purchase Price”), as follows: (i) (A) Buyer shall deliver to Seller at the Closing, by wire transfer in accordance with Seller’s wiring instructions, Fourteen Million Dollars ($14,000,000) less the escrowed amounts held pursuant to the Escrow Agreement among Buyer, Seller and Zions First National Bank, as escrow agent (“Zions”), and (B) Zions shall deliver to Seller at Closing, by wire transfer in accordance with Seller’s wiring instructions, all escrowed amounts held pursuant to such Escrow Agreement; and (ii) Buyer shall pay to Seller
